comments.author: angela
comments.body: applied patch to trunk and merged changes to 2.0 branch

description:
VersionManager#checkout(NodeState nodeState) is called if activity is not supported and thus should call the
corresponding SPI method instead of checkout(NodeState, NodeId activityId)
summary: jcr2spi: versionmanager#checkout(NodeState) should not forward to checkout(NodeState, NodeId)
